companyDescription: Sunway is one of ASEAN’s leading conglomerates with key business interests in property development, healthcare, construction, property investment, REIT, leisure, hospitality, trading and manufacturing, quarry and building materials; and through our not-for-profit Jeffrey Cheah Foundation, education.
